<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Hunting Spider](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3207)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Hunting spiders are the most common type of giant spider, though not the largest.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Hunting Spider](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3207)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 320 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +7; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), web sense

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -4
</row>

**Web Sense** The spider has [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=82) to detect the vibrations of creatures touching its web.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +5 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 16

</row>

**Spring Upon Prey** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Requirements** Initiative has not yet been rolled; **Trigger** A creature touches the hunting spider's web while the spider is on it; **Effect** The hunting spider automatically notices the creature and Strides, Climbs, or Descends on a Web before it rolls initiative.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +9 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing plus hunting spider venom

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
web +7 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** web trap

**Descend on a Web** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) The hunting spider moves straight down up to 40 feet, suspended by a web line. It can hang from the web or drop off. The distance it Descends on a Web doesn't count for [falling damage](/Rules.aspx?ID=402). A creature that successfully Strikes the web (AC 20, Hardness 3, 5 HP) severs it, causing the spider to fall.

**Hunting Spider Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 16 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d4 poison damage and [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage, [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61), and off-guard (1 round); **Stage 3** 1d6 poison damage, clumsy 2, and off-guard (1 round)

**Web Trap**   A creature hit by the hunting spider's web Strike is [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=81) and stuck to the nearest surface until it [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=2296) (DC 17).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-474" />
name: Hunting Spider
